entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
